dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Re: Infringement of Excalibur Entertainment, Inc.'s Federally Registere
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 18, 2005 11:24 AM
To: hr@moviefilmfest.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Re: Infringement of Excalibur Entertainment, Inc.'s
Federally Registered Copyrights]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Re: Infringement of Excalibur Entertainment, Inc.'s
Federally Registered Copyrights
Date: Fri, 15 Apr 2005 10:00:26 -0700
From: HR <hr@moviefilmfest.com>
To: karolek88@interia.pl,abuse@theplanet.com
CC: nobody@excite.com, copyright@yahoo-inc.com, support@hotbot.com,
comments@infoseek.com, suggestions.altavista@pac.dec.com,
webmaster@lycos.com, 2005@moviefilmfest.com, tkroesche@cookseylaw.com

April 15, 2005

SENT VIA EMAIL AND U.S. MAIL

Karolek
www.pornstarseeker.com
karolek88@interia.pl

Krzysztof Rosner
Web Design Studios Krzysztof Rosner
www.bbs.pl
Wczasowa 93
43-310 Bielsko-Biala
Poland

Peter Pathos
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
www.theplanet.com
1333 North Stemmons Freeway, Suite #110
Dallas, TX 75207
abuse@theplanet.com


Re: Infringement of Excalibur Entertainment, Inc.?s Federally Registered
Copyrights

Dear Administrative Contact:

This serves to notify KAROTEK, WWW.PORNSTARSEEKER.COM, WEB DESIGN STUDIOS
KRZYSZTOF ROSNER, WWW.BBS.PL, THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.,
WWW.THEPLANET.COM, and you that Excalibur Entertainment, Inc. owns all
rights to those certain Internet web pages that feature the original text
and art created by Excalibur Entertainment, Inc. (the "Web Pages").  Each
one of the Web Pages is a unique work protected by the United States
Copyright Act, among other laws.

KAROTEK, WWW.PORNSTARSEEKER.COM, WEB DESIGN STUDIOS KRZYSZTOF ROSNER,
WWW.BBS.PL, THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC., WWW.THEPLANET.COM, and
you have reproduced, are publicly displaying, and are making available via
the Internet the Web Pages on web site(s) at one or more uniform resource
locators (the "URL's") including but not limited to:

1.      Stolen Synopsis: http://www.pornstarseeker.com/Abby-Lane/
